annotation: @When("^I try to upload file \"([^\"]*)\" by \"([^\"]*)\" file input element$")
@When("^(?:I |)set browser size to \"([0-9]+)\"px width and \"([0-9]+)\"px height$")
@Then("count of selected elements in {string} checklist is {int}")
@When("^I upload file \"([^\"]*)\" by \"([^\"]*)\" file input element$")
@Then("^the \"([^\"]*)\" number selector value is greater or equal to \"([^\"]*)\"$")
@Then("^the \"([^\"]*)\" number selector value less or equal to \"([^\"]*)\"$")
@Then("^the \"([^\"]*)\" number selector value is greater than \"([^\"]*)\"$")
@Then("^the \"([^\"]*)\" progress value greater or equal to ([0-9]+)$")
@Then("^the \"([^\"]*)\" progress value less or equal to ([0-9]+)$")
@When("^(?:I |)select the radio button with \"([^\"]*)\" index from \"([^\"]*)\"$")
@Then("^the \"([^\"]*)\" does not contain \"([^\"]*)\" enabled radio button$")
@Then("^the \"([^\"]*)\" range value less or equal to ([0-9]+)$")
@Then("^the \"([^\"]*)\" range value greater or equal to ([0-9]+)$")
@Then("^the \"([^\"]*)\" (?:table |)has no rows which has \"([^\"]*)\" in column \"([^\"]*)\"$")
@Then("^the \"([^\"]*)\" (?:table |)has at least \"([^\"]*)\" rows which contains \"([^\"]*)\" in column \"([^\"]*)\"$")
@Then("^the \"([^\"]*)\" (?:table |)has exact \"([^\"]*)\" rows which contains \"([^\"]*)\" in column \"([^\"]*)\"$")
@When("^(?:I |)scroll to the bottom of the page$")
@When("^(?:I |)scroll to the top of the page$")
@Then("^the bottom of the page is reached$")
@Then("^the top of the page is reached$")
